message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hey Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $130 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can meet you in the middle, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to sell it to you for $155.
Alice, $155 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $145?  I'm really hoping we can make this work.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're making a serious effort to reach a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $152, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
